code: import React from'react';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{decrement,increment}from'./counterSlice';import styles from'./Counter.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function Counter(){const count=useSelector(state=>state.counter.value);const dispatch=useDispatch();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.counterContainer,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:styles.counterButton,"aria-label":"Increment value",onClick:()=>dispatch(increment()),children:"Increment"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:styles.counterValue,children:count}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:styles.counterButton,"aria-label":"Decrement value",onClick:()=>dispatch(decrement()),children:"Decrement"})]});}export default Counter;
